answers.answer: Do you have a history of diabetes and asthma in yor family? what about Gerd?

question: hello am a 20 yr old female and since i can remember ive always gotten abdominal pain but lately i feel as to its getting worse i have to urinate frequently also i went for a urine test everything except my leukocytes came out well it was said that i had a few white blood cells doc said not to worry but i dont know it seems like my stomach pains come and go at akward times and moments i can be sitting down or at work laughin joking when one minute i get this sharp pain and i have to go to the bathroom really quickly also ive been havin back pains in my shoulder area i dont know if thats related to my other symptoms but if u have any idea or assumptions can u please let me know thank u
title: Frequent Pain
